sqlMap.select: SELECT MEMBERNO,ID,NICK,GRADE_NO FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE ID = #Id# AND PW = #Pw#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM NOTICEBOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND NOTICETITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
SELECT NOTICENO, NB.MEMBERNO, NOTICETITLE, NOTICECONTENT, NOTICEWRITERDATE, NOTICELOOKUP, MI.NICK FROM NOTICEBOARD NB INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO MI ON NB.MEMBERNO = MI.MEMBERNO WHERE NOTICENO = #NoticeNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE NOTICEBOARD SET NOTICEDEL = 0 WHERE NOTICENO = #NoticeNo#
UPDATE NOTICEBOARD SET NOTICETITLE = #Noticetitle#, NOTICECONTENT = #NoticeContents# WHERE NOTICENO = #NoticeNo#
